page.title: 16Farming in our 'D' block
page.content: Most of the farming in our area is arable and also a little dairy farming. The crops grown are mostly cereals. Cereal crops are wheat, barley and oats.We have seen all these.In the spring some of the fields are bright yellow with oil seed rape. We have eight farms in our area.They are the following:-Bullsland Farm (sq.2),Ashwells Farm(sq.5),Longlane Farm and Woodoaks Farm(sq.8),Skippings Farm(sq.9),Brawlings Farm,Roberts Farm and Tubbs Farm(sq.10).The remaining squares(1,3,4,6,7,11&12)have no farms. When the{M25}was built in the area some farmers lost some fields to let the Motorway through. Most of the animals in our area are cows but some farmers also own horses, sheep and goats.
